text: Create the perfect summer indulgent treat, frozen hot chocolate. Simply blend with ice and milk, then enjoy!
3 tbsp Carnation Rich & Creamy Hot Chocolate
Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend until smooth.
Also works with a blender bottle!
Simply combine all ingredients into a blender bottle, and shake for 1 minute for a silky, smooth chocolatey treat.
